:------ | :----------

### 例子

2x2曲线

```{r}
library(sfcurve)
p = sfc_2x2("I", "2222", rot = 270)
p
plot(p)
```

3x3 Peano曲线

```{r}
p = sfc_3x3_peano("I", "1111")
plot(p)
```

以一条初级曲线作为起始的曲线

```{r}
p = sfc_seed("LLLILILIILIILIIILIIILIIII")
p2 = sfc_2x2(p, "1111")
plot(p2)
```
